derivation: the same as H4583 (מָעוֹן); a residence;
outline:
Maon or Maonites = "habitation"
  1. a man of Judah
  2. the inhabitants of the city of Maon
  3. a city of Judah located 8 miles south of Hebron
kjv_def: Maon, Maonites. Compare H1010 (בֵּית בַּעַל מְעוֹן), H4586 (מְעוּנִי)lemma מְעוּנָי third vowel, corrected to מְעוּנִי.
strongs_def: Maon, the name of an Israelite and of a place in Palestine
